author: adityapatwardhan
body:
The following tests are failing due to the UnixStat issue being disabled in RC build.

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/ca202da6437f5c9ed334725469f6d8f1cb7e5a2c/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Get-FormatData.Tests.ps1#L13

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/ca202da6437f5c9ed334725469f6d8f1cb7e5a2c/test/powershell/engine/ETS/TypeTable.Tests.ps1#L20

# Steps to reproduce

Execute the above tests on RC.1 build

# Expected behavior

No tests fail

# Actual behavior

Tests fail

# Environment data

RC.1 build 

```

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
:tada:This issue was addressed in #11370, which has now been successfully released as `v7.0.0-rc.2`.:tada:

Handy links:
* [Release Notes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.0.0-rc.2)

title: Tests failing due to UnixStat feature being disabled
